DataElement.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Negation Attention Concentration Complete Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify why a neurologic cognitive assessment of attention was not completed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Neurologic Cognitive Assessment Negation Attention Concentration Complete
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to a neurocognitive evaluation of attention (the act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others) not being done.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: (noor-uh-LOJ-ik) Having to do with nerves or the nervous system.:Cognitive; of or being or relating to or involving cognition.:Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: Pertaining to nerves or the nervous system.
Of or being or relating to or involving cognition.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Property.preferredDefinition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others.:To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
The act or process of concentrating, focusing the attention and mental energy on a single object to the exclusion of others.
To possess every necessary or normal part or component or step; having come or been brought to a conclusion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.
